task.title: How to start the Calculator App
task.shortdesc: Here you will find information how to start calculator on your mobile phone.

prereq.p: To use the calculator app, you need to unlock your phone first.

context.p: You can use a calculator app on your smartphone. You will find it useful, when you need to quickly calculate some numbers.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Calculator application icon.

result.p: The application starts.You are now ready to calculate with it

example.p: For example, if you have purchased a book for 5$ and you have given 10$, how much change should you expect? Answer is 10-5=5 $ change.
